text:
Hi Folks, I hope you all are safe from covid pandemic, I'm professional freelance writer with 2 years of experience, having strong hands over technical writing. Other than that, i can write unique plagarism free quality contents on other niches as well.
If anyone of you need a talented writer for your firm or agency, Do let me know. I assure you to provide tremendous writing within given deadlines..
Thanks Alot!

elements.text:
Hi Folks, I hope you all are safe from covid pandemic, I'm professional freelance writer with 2 years of experience, having strong hands over technical writing. Other than that, i can write unique plagarism free quality contents on other niches as well.
If anyone of you need a talented writer for your firm or agency, Do let me know. I assure you to provide tremendous writing within given deadlines..
Thanks Alot!

text: Hello! I am looking to transfer my Television Production experience over to the Advertising/Marketing world, and am so excited to join this group.  I've created over 100 hours of television and my work has spanned networks like: MTV, Bravo, VH1, Food Network, Discovery Plus and more. I take a multifaceted approach: I am constantly working on new development concepts, on-going productions, and current edits for content already filmed. As a 'Senior Story Producer' I am looking at the individual character and creating compelling story points around their journey, if I'm given a concept I am casting authentic people and following their stories, connecting them to the brand.  At the moment I am collaborating on a documentary about MDMA-aided therapy - this is in the early stages of production and I've been working on the language and pitch deck design so Fix Films can present the documentary to capital investment firms.

text: I've also been really drawn to VO since a lot of my work uses it, and I am the temp placement while I wait for talent. I'm wondering if I should create my own reel? Glad to meet someone who also holds the interest!

elements.text: I've also been really drawn to VO since a lot of my work uses it, and I am the temp placement while I wait for talent. I'm wondering if I should create my own reel? Glad to meet someone who also holds the interest!

text: Of course! I feel the same way. Really just dipping my toes for now but I can see this being a big thing for me! :slightly_smiling_face:
